page.title: 01Wolsingham
page.content: {Wolsingham}is a small town of about 2500 inhabitants.It is situated at the eastern end of{Weardale}and is the first major settlement in the dale,which stretches to the Cumbrian border.It is a town with a Steel Works,the major employer,a geriatric hospital,several shops and public houses.{Farming}is the major local source of employment but many people work outside the town. The{buildings}are a mixture of old and new,mostly in stone;there are several Grade 2 listed buildings. Caravan parks,bed and breakfast facilities and picnic sites show that {tourism}is important to the local economy.This area offers many fine walks through meadowland and chance to see pheasant,grouse,deer and hares. {
